title: Inductance Analyzer
subtitle: 3 models: 3255BL (20 Hz to 200 kHz), 3255B (20 Hz to 500 kHz), and 3255BQ (20 Hz to 1 MHz)

paragraphs: The 3255B range of Inductance Analyzers offers precision characterization of devices across a spectrum of conditions. Available in three versions – 3255BL (up to 200kHz), 3255B (up to 500kHz), and 3255BQ (up to 1MHz) – these analyzers are ideal for comprehensive parametric tests during the component development phase, assessing performance over diverse frequencies, AC drive levels, or DC bias currents.

applications: AC parameter and DC resistance measurements
Quality control departments needing efficient, precise sorting and testing

features.title: Versatile Frequency Range
features.description: Models cover a wide frequency range from 20 Hz to 3MHz, accommodating a broad spectrum of test requirements

features.title: High Accuracy
features.description: Achieves basic accuracy of 0.1%, ensuring precise measurement results

features.title: Adjustable AC Drive and DC Bias
features.description: AC drive level settings range from 1 mV to 10 V, with internal DC bias currents adjustable from 1 mA to 1 A (optional). External DC bias capabilities up to 125 A with the 3265B DC Bias Units

features.title: Extended DC Bias for SMD Inductors
features.description: Supports SMD inductor tests up to 50 A with the 1009 DC Bias Fixture, compatible with 3255B and 3265B/25A units for thorough device evaluation at operational bias currents

features.title: Bin Sorting Function
features.description: Offers component sorting into up to ten bins based on absolute values or percentage of values, facilitating quality control and component selection

features.title: Safety Features
features.description: Includes safety interlock systems and protection against over-temperature, excess voltage drop, and sense lead failure, ensuring user safety and equipment reliability

features.title: Intuitive Operation
features.description: Designed for straightforward, user-friendly operation with fast measurement speeds (up to 20 measurements per second), making it suitable for both lab and production environments

features.title: Connectivity and Control
features.description: Features GPIB control with LabVIEW™ driver support for integration into automated test setups. Results can be directly printed using the parallel Centronics interface for analysis and archiving

features.title: Customizable Test Fixtures
features.description: Offers interchangeable component test carriers for versatility in testing different devices, with a design and manufacturing service available for device-specific fixtures

specifications.heading: Measurement Function
content: Z, Ø, L, C, Rac, Rdc, Q, D, turns ratio

specifications.heading: Drive Level
content: 1 mV to 10V rms into open circuit
50 µA to 200 mA rms into short circuit
Automatic Level Control (ALC) maintains level applied to DUT at ±2%, ±1 mV of set voltage or ±2%, ±0.1 mA of set current, reduces to ±4% below 100 Hz

specifications.heading: Input Specification
content: Power supply 230 V AC ±10% or 115 V AC ±10% (selectable)

specifications.heading: Display
content: High contrast monochrome LCD 320 x 240 dot with CFL back lighting

specifications.heading: Measurement Connections
content: 4-wire (Kelvin) measurements with screen at ground potential
